author: Darrell Etherington
title: Mesa Biotech gains emergency FDA approval for rapid, point-of-care COVID-19 test
description: The U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA) is making use of its Emergency Use Authorization (EUA) powers to expand the pool of available COVID-19 testing resources in the U.S., and now you can add another rapid test that delivers results in just 30 minutes t…
